name: Miniren
description: Extremely minimalist style for renren.com. All but core functionalities are hidden from view. Based on style 87253 by user 188475. （迷你人：人人网极简用户界面）

user.name: Lesbius
user.about: Homo sum, humani nihil a me alienum puto.

additional_info:
Updated 07-11-2014: Fixed theme for new login page. Known issues: Profile detail page does not work as expected. Hoping that someone who actually knows CSS well can fix this. Updated 29-10-2013: Fixed layout issue in friends management interface. Now restyles login page as well. 迷你人：人人网极简用户界面，去除几乎所有非核心功能与元素。 Combat superfluous functionalities and browse only what's useful!
  • Removes all ads.
  • Hides all but the core functionalities of renren.com.
  • Restyles news feed to a 2 column design.
  • Removes all references to premium profile perks, and removes the effects of such perks on other users who have them as much as possible.
  • Restyles annoying myspace-style customized profiles to the default theme.
This style incorporates style 87253 by user 188475.
